    • Class Gameplay extends javax.swing.JPanel implements Serializable

      • Serialized Fields

        • textbox

          TextBox textbox
          The TextBox to work with.

        • background

          Background background
          The background to work with.

        • person

          Person person
          The person to work with.

        • healthBar

          HealthBar healthBar
          The healthBar to work with.

        • visualNovelSpeaker

          Text visualNovelSpeaker
          The name of the person speaking. For use in visual novel text.

        • visualNovelText

          Text visualNovelText
          The text spoken to be displayed. For use in visual novel text.

        • instructions

          java.util.ArrayList<E> instructions
          The ArrayList of instructions to be carried out by the Gameplay class.

        • index

          int index
          The current index in the game. Each portion of the game has its own line.

        • lines

          int lines
          The total number of lines in the current game script.

        • mode

          int mode
          What the Gameplay class is currently handling. 0 is visualnovel-style text which the user advances through, 1 is prompting the user to select text, and 2 is prompting the user to type text.

        • completed

          boolean completed
          Whether or not this part of the game is fully completed.

        • enemyText

          java.lang.String enemyText
          The text the enemy will type.

        • playerText

          java.lang.String playerText
          The text the player will type.

        • question

          java.lang.String question
          The question to ask the user.

        • responses

          java.util.ArrayList<E> responses
          The list of possible Strings the user will type.

        • correctResponse

          int correctResponse
          The correct response to type, as an index in the responses variable. All incorrect responses typed will make the enemy type faster.

        • ts

          TextSelector ts
          The TextSelector for use when the player chooses what text they want to type.

        • enemyTextObj

          Text enemyTextObj
          The Text objects the enemy and player will type respectively.

        • playerTextObj

          Text playerTextObj
          The Text objects the enemy and player will type respectively.

        • typeTimer

          javax.swing.Timer typeTimer
          The timer used to track typing.

        • lastLine

          int lastLine
          Whether the last line is in visual novel or typing mode.

        • treeLoc

          int treeLoc
          The location of the second argument tree.

        • failed

          boolean failed
          Whether or not the user has failed the level.

        • difficulty

          int difficulty
          The difficulty of the game.

    • Class VisualNovel extends javax.swing.JPanel implements Serializable

      • Serialized Fields

        • textbox

          TextBox textbox
          The TextBox to work with.

        • background

          Background background
          The background to work with.

        • textList

          java.util.ArrayList<E> textList
          The ArrayList of Text objects. Each object will be shown once in the process of the visual novel screen.

        • personList

          java.util.ArrayList<E> personList
          The ArrayList of Person objects. Each object is shown along with its associated textList object.

        • index

          int index
          The current index in the visual novel. Each line has its own index to manage storytelling.

        • lines

          int lines
          The total number of lines in the current script.

        • completed

          boolean completed
          Whether or not this visual novel portion is fully completed.
